action_description: This Action will turn a Wemo Maker off then on. If the WeMo Maker is already off, it will remain off.

action: Turn relay on momentarily multiple times
action_description: This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on for 300 milliseconds as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Momentary' mode for this Action to work.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker off. If the WeMo Maker is already off, it will remain off.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on for 300 milliseconds. Note: WeMo Maker must be in 'Momentary' mode for this action to work.

action: Turn relay off then on multiple times
action_description: This Action will turn relay off then on as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Toggle' mode for this Action to work.
This Action will turn a WeMo Maker on then off. If the WeMo Maker is already on, it will be turned off after 2 seconds.
This Action will turn your WeMo Maker on. If the WeMo Maker is already on, it will remain on.

action: Turn relay on then off multiple times
action_description: This Action will turn relay on then off as many times as you set. Note: The WeMo Maker must be in 'Toggle' mode for this Action to work.
This Action will toggle a Wemo Maker if it is in toggle mode. If the relay is on, it will be turned off and vice versa.
